main event: The report describes a UFO sighting where a circular object, approximately two miles in diameter, was observed at a very high speed and altitude, with no sound and no tail contrails.
interesting points: The object was described as circular, approximately two miles in diameter, and was observed to be half a mile apart with no tail contrails.
It was reported to be very fast, very high at around 9,000 ft, and made no sound.
The sighting was observed moving from 6 to 8 degrees above the horizon in the west to 12 to 20 degrees above the horizon in the east.
The object followed a straight path overhead and did not seem to follow any standard aircraft trajectory.
The cause of the sighting was unknown, and there were no other reported sightings or physical evidence.
sighted object: circular UFO approximately two miles in diameter
witnesses: US Air Force personnel at Walker AFB and the tower personnel
